mapper.insert: insert into bookmark (bookmark_num, bookmark_albumnum, bookmark_memberid, bookmark_page) values (bookmark_seq.nextval, #{bookmark_albumnum}, #{bookmark_memberid}, #{bookmark_page})
mapper.select: select * from bookmark where bookmark_albumnum = #{bookmark_albumnum} and bookmark_memberid = #{bookmark_memberid} and bookmark_page = #{bookmark_page}
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where bookmark_albumnum = #{bookmark_albumnum} and bookmark_memberid = #{bookmark_memberid} and bookmark_page = #{bookmark_page}
